item.title: Southwest Airlines will end cabin service earlier to reduce risk of turbulence-related injuries
item.description: More than one-third of all airline incidents in the United States from 2009 through 2018 were related to turbulence.

item.title: How long does it take to get fit again after falling ‘out of shape’?
item.description: Whether you're recovering from an injury or life simply got in the way, if you’re feeling "out of shape," here's how to get active again.

item.title: Black Friday sales accelerate with online a bright spot
item.description: Retail sales, excluding automotive, grew 3.4% on the day after Thanksgiving, according to Mastercard SpendingPulse.

item.title: Trump names Charles Kushner, pardoned real estate mogul and father of his son-in-law, as US ambassador to France
item.description: The elder Kushner was pardoned by Trump in December 2020 after pleading guilty years earlier to tax evasion and making illegal campaign donations.

item.title: Jensen Huang shares the pick-up line he used in college when he first met his wife
item.description: "I had no idea what I was talking about. And then we got married. That’s all the advice I’m going to give all the entrepreneurs."
